name: Snooker Star 2018
description:
Snooker Star 2018 is a suite of games featuring several variations of Pool, Billiards, Snooker games. The full screen 3D graphics are spectacular and the physics are realistic and accurate with stunning environment. The action is smooth and fast paced! Power Pool, Be the Master of Snooker Star 2018 Competition, the Top Arena Game of Sports and Board! And now it's docile!Ready for some real pool action? With a ton of games and lots of fast paced action, in this game will keep the most seasoned pro playing well into the night. Its realistic 3D graphics and linear shot guides help you line up your shot, modify the shooting angle, and see where your shot is going to land, making it easy to line yourself up for your next move. You may also play against player or in pass and play mode docile.
Random Shots:
- There are 10 levels.
- Each level will have different number of balls to pot within given shots.
- The level success will Open next levels.
Time Attack Mode:
- Pot all balls in given time.
- Play any ball no game rules apply.
- Take +5 on each successful pot & -5 on potting cue ball.
Challenge Mode:
- This is single player challenge game.
- Pot all 15 balls in the holes.
- You will have total 6 shots to pot in the balls.
- Each successful pot will increase your number of shots & will decrease if failed.
